entry.title: Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces Large Custom Puzzle with large pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (4 variants)

Our Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces is a beautiful portrait puzzle.  Featuring very vibrant colors and thick board, this puzzle is absolutely stunning. Each piece in this Poster Size puzzle will measure approximately 2 x 2 inches, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches!  
 
A fantastic buy, this puzzle costs less than most single prints from a photographer.  Very affordable and a great value on a professional puzzle. Looks amazing framed.

entry.title: Custom Photo Wedding Guest Book Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle Choose 150 or 200 Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 79.99 - 97.99 (8 variants)

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely stunning and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   This puzzle is beautifully printed in a professional-grade matte finish and is cut on a very thick 100% recycled board.  Be Earth-conscious and trendy.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory. It also looks amazing framed!

Details: 

  • 200 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.
  • 150 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will have an average size of 2 x 2 inches each and a nice surface area for a few words and signature  The finished size will be approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.   

BEST RESULTS: This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. 

HAND NUMBERING OPTION:   We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil, which saves a ton of time and significantly helps with assembly.  We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.  

We recommend using a medium point pen on our regular backing, which is a light color.

entry.title: 200 Piece Custom Photo Jigsaw Wedding Guest Book Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 82.99 - 97.99 (4 variants)

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely HUGE and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   Gather your engagement photos and turn one into a custom photo puzzle guestbook.  Your guests will love the fun of interacting with your Guest Book Puzzle and will always be a piece of your big day.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory on a puzzle piece.  Never put your guestbook in the closet again, instead frame it and display it for everyone to see.

SIZE: Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, making this an easy to frame standard-size puzzle! 

BEST RESULTS: This is a Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

RECOMMENDATION: We recommend having your photo hand-numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but are not exact.  We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil so that they can be easily erased after assembly.  

We recommend using a medium-point ballpoint pen to write on the back of the puzzle pieces.  Please be sure to have a few handy for your guests!

If you are having a smaller wedding and you need fewer pieces we have you covered!  Click THIS LINK to go to our 16x20 inch puzzles.

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle With 104 Pieces - A Fun Family Portrait Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 54.99 (4 variants)

Your photo on our Very Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle.     This beautiful custom puzzle features 104 very large puzzle pieces.  Measuring approximately 16" x 20" (inches) when assembled, this custom puzzle is a favorite among our customers for its extra-large puzzle pieces and professional look, as we print on a premium matte paper to create your beautiful puzzle.

The large pieces in this completely personalized puzzle show great detail in the puzzle pieces and look amazing framed. Our 104 piece puzzle is perfect for Family Portraits and Alzheimer's and Dementia patients.    

If you are looking for a gift for the hard to buy for person, look no further.  This personalized photo puzzle makes an unbelievable Birthday, Anniversary, Graduation, Special Occasion gift, or a gift for Seniors.  This puzzle has also been used for the visually impaired, as the puzzle pieces are extra large.

*Have been used with Alzheimer's therapy patients for family recognition.*  The absolute perfect custom jigsaw puzzle with unlimited possibilities.

For information on Alzheimer's and Dementia puzzle recommendations, please see our article HERE.

If you need help with your questions about your photo resolution, we have an easy-to-use chart HERE.

Such an exciting time to be engaged.  Now it's time to ask your wedding party to be a part of the ceremony.  Ask them with an elegant customized keepsake puzzle that is personalized with their name.

Choose our standard design or customize with your own text.  It fast, inexpensive and very elegant.

entry.title: Extra Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle with 80 large pieces

Type: Wedding

Our custom photo puzzles are the perfect way to tell your story and preserve memories. Our puzzle pieces are large, high-quality, and easy for little hands to handle. We can create a custom puzzle for any occasion.

This beautiful and large 80 piece puzzle features large puzzle pieces that capture memories.  Having an average size of 2 x 2 inches each, this puzzle has an approximate finished size of 16 x 20 inches when complete.  Thick durable puzzle pieces on a professional matte finish for a stunning puzzle of YOU.  

This puzzle features very large pieces that are easily handled and show great detail.  This is the perfect puzzle if you have older puzzlers who have vision problems or need larger puzzle pieces to handle.  

Makes a great gift for anyone on your list.

entry.title: Personalized Photo Puzzle - YOU CHOOSE THE PIECE COUNT from 15 to 500 pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 51.99 (14 variants)

Everyone loves puzzles, especially custom photo puzzles.  Gather your most cherished photo memories and turn them into personalized photo puzzles.  We offer a wide variety of piece counts for every age and ability level.  

Here is the breakdown of our 16x20 inch puzzles:

  • Our 15 piece puzzle features extra-large puzzle pieces. Perfect for showing great detail.  Pieces vary but are approximately 4 x 5 inches each.
  • Our 30 piece is excellent for 3 to 5-year-old children who are getting their puzzling skills on.  This is a very versatile puzzle and is popular in our shop.
  • Our 63 piece is a really nice puzzle for anyone with large pieces and a size that is perfect for framing.  Pieces are large and easy to handle.
  • Our 104 piece puzzle is a very popular puzzle for the family portrait.  Each piece averages 1.5 x 2 inches, which is large.
  • *Our 320 piece puzzle is the most popular puzzle, as the pieces are approximately 1x1 inch and easily handled by puzzlers who have advanced skills.
  • *Our 500 piece is very challenging, featuring pieces that are very similar in shape and size but are not exact.  This puzzle is recommended for the expert, as it is very challenging! Not for the faint of heart.  Please choose a photo that is colorful and has a variety of textures.

**Our 320 and 500 piece puzzles are recommended for the expert plus puzzler.  The puzzles feature pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge.  It is recommended that photos for these piece counts have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided.

entry.title: Photo Puzzle with 63 Extra Large Pieces - The perfect Guest Book Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 53.49 (4 variants)

The perfect Guest Book or Children's puzzle. This 63 piece puzzle is perfect for young children or adults who want to show detail in their pictures or are just learning how to piece it all together.  Generous sized pieces make it easy to work with, while providing the detail needed to preserve cherished memories.  Each piece, on average, measures approximately 2.25x 2.25 inches (on average).  Finished size will be approximately 16x20 inches.  PHOTO IS OF A 63 PIECE PUZZLE.
 
This puzzle has also been used in Weddings as a Wedding Guest Book to complete the pieces of the puzzle, where guests sign each generous sized piece to finish off the perfect day!  A wonderful way to remember your Wedding Day.  Makes the perfect unique gift idea for the hard to buy for person.
